overview: IMS Research was founded by Matthew Towers in 1989. Today the company is recognised as one of the leading global market analyst firms servicing the electronics industry, spanning three continents and employing over 100 people, the company produces detailed market intelligence on technology markets ranging from consumer electronics to medical equipment and renewable energy. Matthew worked as a senior analyst in a variety of industries including semiconductors, wireless communications, power electronics, and consumer appliances, providing consultancy services and producing detailed market reports. In recent years, he has been particularly closely involved in the automation, power/energy, medical, security and automotive sectors at IMS Research.
